mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NO , M.ID , M.NICK , M.NAME , M.EMAIL , M.TEL , TO_CHAR (M.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , TO_CHAR (M.MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DATE , M.DEL_YN , A.ADDRESS FROM MEMBER M JOIN ADDRESS A ON A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
